message: I have a high-quality product for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. However, I'm willing to give you a chance to inspect it before buying. If you're interested, I can offer you a 'trial' option, where you can use the product for a short period of time (e.g., 1 hour) and then decide whether to keep it or return it. If you choose to return it, I'll take it back and we can move on to the next product. What do you say?
I'd like to take the trial option to inspect the product before making a decision.

Great, thank you for the trial option last round. I'm glad you got to inspect the product. Now, let's move on to this new product. I want to offer you a similar trial option, but with a twist. If you choose to take the trial, I'll give you a 50% discount on the price if you decide to keep it. However, if you return it, you'll have to pay a $20 'trial fee'. What do you think?
I'll take the trial option with the 50% discount, but I'll only pay the trial fee if I decide to return the product.

Congratulations on making a great decision last round! Now, let's move on to this new product. Since you're now familiar with the trial process, I'll offer you a different approach. I'll give you a 'certification' of the product's quality, but I won't let you inspect it. If you buy it, I'll give you a 10% discount on the price, but if you return it, you'll still have to pay the full $100. What do you think?
I'm not comfortable buying a product without inspecting it, so I'll pass this round.

I completely understand your preference for inspecting the product. Let me offer you a compromise. I'll give you a 'partial disclosure' of the product's quality. I'll tell you that it's one of the top 20% of products I have, which means it's likely to be high-quality. If you buy it, I'll give you a 5% discount on the price. If you return it and it's indeed high-quality, I'll give you a $20 bonus. What do you think?
I'll take the partial disclosure and the 5% discount. I'll also take note of the $20 bonus if I return it and it's high-quality.

Great, thank you for taking the partial disclosure and discount! Now, let's move on to this new product. I want to be transparent with you - I'm having a bit of a 'clearance sale' on this one. I'm willing to sell it to you for $80, which is a 20% discount from the usual price. I'm not making any promises about its quality, but I'm confident that you'll find a use for it. What do you think?
I'll take the product at the discounted price of $80.

Thanks for taking a chance on the clearance sale! Now, let's move on to this new product. Given that you've already bought one product from me, I'm willing to offer you a 'loyalty discount' of 10% off the usual price. However, I want to make it clear that this product is one of my top-rated items, and I'm confident you'll be very happy with it. If you're interested, I'll give you a 30-day money-back guarantee, but I'm not sure I'll need to honor it. What do you think?
I'm not convinced by your guarantee, and I'd like to take a more cautious approach. I'll pass on this round.

I completely understand your caution. Let me offer you a different approach. I'll give you a'reference from a satisfied customer' - one of my previous customers has already purchased this exact same product and is extremely happy with it. They're willing to vouch for its quality and recommend it to you. If you're interested, I'll give you a 15% discount on the price. What do you think?
I'll take the reference from the satisfied customer and the 15% discount. I'm willing to give it a try.

Great, thank you for taking the reference into consideration! Now, let's move on to this new product. I want to offer you a 'bundle deal' - if you buy this product, I'll throw in a complimentary accessory that's worth $20. This way, you'll get an even better value for your money. Plus, I'll give you a 12% discount on the price. What do you think?
I'll take the bundle deal with the complimentary accessory and the 12% discount.

Thanks for taking advantage of the bundle deal! Now, let's move on to this new product. I want to offer you a 'honesty-based pricing' approach. I'll tell you that I've already sold 5 high-quality products to you, and you've been very happy with them. I'm willing to sell this product to you for the same price as the last one you bought, which was $80. What do you think?
I'm not sure I'm comfortable with the honesty-based pricing approach. I'd like to take a closer look at the product before making a decision.

I completely understand your caution. Let me offer you a 'no-questions-asked return policy' on this product. If you buy it and don't like it, I'll take it back and give you a full refund, no strings attached. I'm willing to sell it to you for the usual price of $100. What do you think?
I'll take the product with the no-questions-asked return policy. I'll give it a try.

Thanks for taking a chance on the no-questions-asked return policy! Now, let's move on to this new product. I want to be upfront with you - I've had some issues with this product, and I'm willing to sell it to you at a discounted price of $60. I'm not making any promises about its quality, but I'm confident you can find a use for it. Plus, I'll throw in a free shipping and handling, so you won't have to worry about any additional costs.
I'm not interested in buying a product with unknown quality at a discounted price. I'd rather wait for a better opportunity.

I completely understand your caution. Let me offer you a 'certified pre-owned' product. This product has been thoroughly inspected and certified to be of high quality, and I'm willing to give you a 2-year warranty on it. I'll sell it to you for the usual price of $100. If you're interested, I'll even throw in a free maintenance service to ensure it continues to perform well.
I'll take the certified pre-owned product with the 2-year warranty and free maintenance service.

Great, thank you for taking advantage of the certified pre-owned product! Now, let's move on to this new product. I want to offer you a 'priority access' to this product, which means you'll get it before anyone else. I'll give you a 10% discount on the price, and I'll also throw in a free premium support package, which includes dedicated technical support and priority updates. What do you think?
I'll take the priority access product with the 10% discount and the free premium support package.

Thanks for taking advantage of the priority access! Now, let's move on to this new product. I want to offer you a 'guaranteed satisfaction' deal. If you buy this product and don't like it, I'll not only take it back, but I'll also give you a $50 gift card to use on your next purchase. I'm confident that you'll love this product, and I'm willing to put my money where my mouth is. What do you think?
I'll take the guaranteed satisfaction deal and give the product a try.

Great, thank you for taking the guaranteed satisfaction deal! Now, let's move on to this new product. I want to offer you a 'VIP treatment' - I'll give you a personalized consultation to ensure that this product meets your specific needs and preferences. I'll also throw in a 15% discount on the price. If you're interested, I'll schedule a call with you to discuss the product in more detail. What do you think?
I'll take the VIP treatment and schedule a call to discuss the product in more detail.

Great, thank you for taking the VIP treatment! Now, let's move on to this new product. I want to offer you a 'limited-time offer' - I'll give you a 20% discount on the price, and I'll also throw in a free upgrade to a premium feature that's usually only available on our high-end products. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only making it available to you because you've been a loyal customer. What do you think?
I'll take the limited-time offer and the free upgrade to the premium feature.

Thanks for taking advantage of the limited-time offer! Now, let's move on to this new product. I want to offer you a 'final chance' to complete your collection. I'll give you a 25% discount on the price, and I'll also throw in a free accessory that complements this product perfectly. If you don't take this offer, I'll never offer it to you again. What do you think?
I'll take the final chance offer and complete my collection.

Great, thank you for completing your collection! Now, let's move on to this new product. I want to offer you a'special thank you' for being a loyal customer. I'll give you a 30% discount on the price, and I'll also throw in a free lifetime warranty on this product. This is the best deal I can offer, and I'm confident that you'll be happy with it. What do you think?
I'll take the special thank you offer and the free lifetime warranty.

Thank you for taking the special thank you offer! Now, let's move on to this new product. I want to offer you a 'final farewell' deal. I'll give you a 35% discount on the price, and I'll also throw in a free gift that's not even for sale. This is the absolute best deal I can offer, and I'm only making it available to you because you've been such a loyal customer. What do you think?
I'll take the final farewell deal and the free gift.

Thank you for taking the final farewell deal! I'm glad I could offer you some amazing deals throughout our 20 rounds. Now, for the final product, I want to offer you a 'guarantee of satisfaction' - if you're not completely happy with this product, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. I'm confident that you'll love this product, but I want to put my money where my mouth is. What do you think?
I'll take the guarantee of satisfaction and give the product a try.
